title: Chao tokens crash when clicked
body: Whenever i click on the tokens or open the loot i crashed for whatever reason any help?

replies.body: Hey! This was a result of a larger issue surrounding loot. We've resolved everything, and you should be good to go. Super sorry for the inconvenience. D: Lemme know if you're still having any issues! :)
Thanks for replying and Proving me it's not from my computer ;D
Of course! Definitely something on our side this time around. :P
